Hello,

 I'm using DataGird to display items. In the background Grid's DataContext is being updated every second by DispacherTimer. When user selects grid row/cell, the selected row/cell looses focus on each DataContext update.

How could I avoid this behavour ? Or is there a better way to display information via Grid control in real-time?
